sourcesContent:
const formDataAddOns = [
{
    labelName: "Online service",
    labelInfo: "Access to multiplayer games",
    typeInput: "checkbox",
    checked: false,
    valueMo: 1,
    valueYr: 10,
    id: "service",
    labelSpanMo: "+$1/mo",
    labelSpanYr: "+$10/yr",
    spanClass: "text-[14px] font-normal text-purple absolute right-[24px] bottom-[31px]",
    labelClass: "flex flex-col justify-center text-[16px] leading-[22px] font-normal text-denim w-[450px] h-[81px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey hover:border-purple bg-checkboxNonActive bg-no-repeat bg-[24px_center] cursor-pointer pl-[68px] relative mb-[16px]",
    infoClass: "text-[14px] leading-[20px] font-normal text-grey ",
    inputOnsClass: "opacity-0 absolute",
},
{
    labelName: "Larger storage",
    labelInfo: "Extra 1TB of cloud save",
    typeInput: "checkbox",
    checked: true,
    valueMo: 2,
    valueYr: 20,
    id: "storage",
    labelSpanMo: "+$2/mo",
    labelSpanYr: "+$20/yr",
    spanClass: "text-[14px] font-normal text-purple absolute right-[24px] bottom-[31px]",
    labelClass: "flex flex-col justify-center text-[16px] leading-[22px] font-normal text-denim w-[450px] h-[81px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey hover:border-purple bg-checkboxNonActive bg-no-repeat bg-[24px_center] cursor-pointer pl-[68px] relative mb-[16px]",
    infoClass: "text-[14px] leading-[20px] font-normal text-grey ",
    inputOnsClass: "opacity-0 absolute",
},
{
    labelName: "Customizable Profile",
    labelInfo: "Custom theme on your profile",
    typeInput: "checkbox",
    checked: false,
    valueMo: 2,
    valueYr: 20,
    id: "profile",
    labelSpanMo: "+$2/mo",
    labelSpanYr: "+$20/yr",
    spanClass: "text-[14px] font-normal text-purple absolute right-[24px] bottom-[31px]",
    labelClass: "flex flex-col justify-center text-[16px] leading-[22px] font-normal text-denim w-[450px] h-[81px] rounded-[8px] border-[1px] border-liteGrey hover:border-purple bg-checkboxNonActive bg-no-repeat bg-[24px_center] cursor-pointer pl-[68px] relative ",
    infoClass: "text-[14px] leading-[20px] font-normal text-grey ",
    inputOnsClass: "opacity-0 absolute",
}
];

export default formDataAddOns
